name: Project AI
description:
Project AI is a third person puzzle/adventure game where you try to escape from a virtual prison as a highly advanced artifical intelligence. It combines multiple gameplay elements from different genres to offer players an always changing and unique gameplay experience. 

Game and Level Design

Batuhan Atamal - Ekim Tan

Story

Batuhan Atamal - Ekim Tan

Programming

Ekim Tan

Art, Models and Visual Effects

Ekim Tan

Musics

İsmet Bali

Sound Effects 

Can Ozan

The project is currently on hold.
